name: storage-key
effect: Grants access to the Team Galactic warehouse in Veilstone City.
short_effect: Grants access to the Team Galactic warehouse in Veilstone City.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
The key to the
storage inside the
ABANDONED SHIP.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
The key to the
storage inside the
ABANDONED SHIP.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
A key that opens the storage hold
inside the ABANDONED SHIP.
It is old and looks easily broken.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:

warehouse located at the edge of
Veilstone City.
